title: How to Make Edamame Fried Rice

steps.headline: Heat a wok or large skillet pan.
steps.description: Use the coconut oil in the pan and place it over medium high heat.

steps.headline: Scramble the eggs.
steps.description: Whisk the eggs in a separate bowl and quickly cook them in the pan.

steps.headline: Sauté the onions and carrots.
steps.description: Allow the onions to become translucent or clear in color.

steps.headline: Add the rest of the ingredients.
steps.description: Lower the heat and integrate the rice into everything as much as possible. Use a spoon to break up as much chunks as you can, while mixing at the same time.

steps.headline: Serve the fried rice.
steps.description: Use immediately or freeze for later consumption.

text: Heat a wok or large skillet pan. Use the coconut oil in the pan and place it over medium high heat. Scramble the eggs. Whisk the eggs in a separate bowl and quickly cook them in the pan. Sauté the onions and carrots. Allow the onions to become translucent or clear in color. Add the rest of the ingredients. Lower the heat and integrate the rice into everything as much as possible. Use a spoon to break up as much chunks as you can, while mixing at the same time. Simmer for about 5 to 7 minutes.  Serve the fried rice. Use immediately or freeze for later consumption. Finished.
